kpi.name: mob_msc177b
kpi.formula: ho1.outgoingintermscintragsmok + ho1.outgoingintermscgsmtoumtsok + ho1.outgoingintermscumtstogsmok + ho1.outgoingintermscintraumtsok + ho1.outierplmniermscintragsmok + ho1.outierplmniermscgsmtoumtsok + ho1.outierplmniermscumtstogsmok + ho1.outierplmniermscintraumtsok

kpi_info.title: Successful outgoing inter-MSC HO (2G and 3G)
kpi_info.use: Indicates number of successful outgoing inter-MSC Handovers in MSC.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(
OutgoingInterMscIntraGsmOk
+ OutgoingInterMscGsmToUmtsOk
+ OutgoingInterMscUmtsToGsmOk
+ OutgoingInterMscIntraUmtsOk
+ OutIerPlmnIerMscIntraGsmOk
+ OutIerPlmnIerMscGsmToUmtsOk
+ OutIerPlmnIerMscUmtsToGsmOk
+ OutIerPlmnIerMscIntraUmtsOk)


Counters from view(s) :
RNS_PS_HO1_MSC_{time_agg}, RNS_PS_HO1BH_MSC_{time_agg}
